mapper.delete: delete from related where gid=#{gid} and rid=#{rid}
mapper.select: select *, format(price,0) as fmtprice, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') fmtdate from goods order by regDate desc limit #{start}, #{size};
mapper.insert: insert into goods(gid, title, price, image, brand, maker) values(#{gid}, #{title}, #{price}, #{image}, #{brand}, #{maker})
